duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the examination and treatment of patients under the direction of a physician.
Prepare treatment rooms, clean and disinfect equipment, restock supplies.
Accompany patients from waiting room, prepare patients for examination, and record patient information.
Measure, collect, and record patient's vital signs, prepare patients for tests, procedures, and x-rays.
Perform routine patient testing, process electrocardiograms, and collect and process specimens.
Prepare and administer routine medications, injections, and vaccinations, and identify/report adverse reactions.
Remove sutures and staples, change dressings as requested.

education_certification.credential: Certified Medical Assistant (CMA) from a recognized program
